channel.title: Hate Exceptions
channel.description:
Not very good with exceptions, so if you could help me that would be great! ;)
Getting this exception.
[CODE]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at server.model.players.PlayerSave.saveGame(PlayerSave.java:314) at server.model.players.PlayerSaving.saveAllPlayers(PlayerSaving.java:56 ) at server.model.players.PlayerSaving.run(PlayerSaving.java:32) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/CODE]
Here is line 314:
[CODE]characterfile.write(p.yellTag, 0, p.yellTag.length());[/CODE]
If you need any other line just ask.
Thanks for the help!

item.title: Hate Exceptions
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

pk2play:

Seems okay, but I don’t know how I got the exception in the first place.[/quote][quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:416974”]The yellTag is null and it shouldn’t be. Chances are it saves the player file when they first log in, and since the yellTag defaults to null, calling length() throws the exception.

Read full topic

item.title: Hate Exceptions
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)
&& !playerCommand.startsWith(“yelltag”)) {
try {
final String message = playerCommand.substring(5);
if (c.yellbanned == true) {
c.sendMessage(“You have been banned from yell. Appeal on forums”);
return;
}
if (((System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastyell) < 45000)
&& (c.memberStatus <= 0)) {
c.sendMessage(“You can only yell once per 45 seconds. Donators get unlimited yell.”);
return;
}
if (((System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastyell) < 4000)
&& (c.playerRights > 0)) {
return;
}
for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
if (player != null) {
final Client c2 = (Client) player;
c.lastyell = System.currentTimeMillis();
if (c.playerRights <= 1) {
c2.sendMessage("" + c.yellTag + c.playerName
+ “: @dre@”
+ Misc.optimizeText(message));
} else if (c.playerRights == 2) {
c2.sendMessage("" + c.yellTag + c.playerName
+ “: @blu@”
+ Misc.optimizeText(message));
} else if (c.playerRights == 3) {
c2.sendMessage("" + c.yellTag + c.playerName
+ “: @bla@” + Misc.optimizeText(message));
}
}
}
} catch (final Exception e) {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong syntax use as ::yell message”);
}
}

	if (playerCommand.startsWith("yelltag") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) {
		try {
			final String newYellTag = Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand
					.substring(8));
			if (newYellTag.length() > 8) {
				c.sendMessage("Max length for yell tags is 8 characters!");
				return;
			}
			for (final String element : Config.BADTAGS) {
				if (newYellTag.startsWith(element) && !(c.playerRights < 3)) {
					c.sendMessage("You cannot set your yell tag to that!");
					return;
				}
			}
			if (newYellTag.contains("@")) {
				c.sendMessage("Color codes not supported");
				return;
			}
			if (newYellTag.startsWith("default")) {
				c.customYell = false;
				c.getYellTag();
				c.sendMessage("Your yelltag has been reset.");
				return;
			} else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
				c.yellTag = "[@gr3@" + newYellTag + "@bla@]";
			} else if ((c.playerRights == 3) || (c.playerRights == 2)) {
				c.yellTag = "[@red@" + newYellTag + "@bla@]";
			} else if (c.memberStatus == 2) {
				c.yellTag = "[@bla@" + newYellTag + "@blu@]";
			}
			c.sendMessage("Succesfully changed your yell tag to: "
					+ c.yellTag);
			c.customYell = false;

		} catch (final Exception e) {
			c.sendMessage("Wrong syntax use as ::yelltag youryelltag");
		}
	}

[/code]

Read full topic
